skillsSnapshot.prompt:
The following skills provide specialized instructions for specific tasks.
Use the read tool to load a skill's file when the task matches its description.
When a skill file references a relative path, resolve it against the skill directory (parent of SKILL.md / dirname of the path) and use that absolute path in tool commands.

<available_skills>
  <skill>
    <name>1password</name>
    <description>Set up and use 1Password CLI (op). Use when installing the CLI, enabling desktop app integration, signing in (single or multi-account), or reading/injecting/running secrets via op.</description>
    <location>/usr/local/lib/node_modules/openclaw/skills/1password/SKILL.md</location>
  </skill>
  <skill>
    <name>apple-notes</name>
    <description>Manage Apple Notes via the `memo` CLI on macOS (create, view, edit, delete, search, move, and export notes). Use when a user asks OpenClaw to add a note, list notes, search notes, or manage note folders.</description>
    <location>/usr/local/lib/node_modules/openclaw/skills/apple-notes/SKILL.md</location>
  </skill>
  <skill>
    <name>apple-reminders</name>
    <description>Manage Apple Reminders via the `remindctl` CLI on macOS (list, add, edit, complete, delete). Supports lists, date filters, and JSON/plain output.</description>
    <location>/usr/local/lib/node_modules/openclaw/skills/apple-reminders/SKILL.md</location>
  </skill>
  <skill>
    <name>bear-notes</name>
    <description>Create, search, and manage Bear notes via grizzly CLI.</description>
    <location>/usr/local/lib/node_modules/openclaw/skills/bear-notes/SKILL.md</location>
  </skill>
  <skill>
    <name>blogwatcher</name>
    <description>Monitor blogs and RSS/Atom feeds for updates using the blogwatcher CLI.</description>
    <location>/usr/local/lib/node_modules/openclaw/skills/blogwatcher/SKILL.md</location>
  </skill>
  <skill>
    <name>blucli</name>
    <description>BluOS CLI (blu) for discovery, playback, grouping, and volume.</description>
    <location>/usr/local/lib/node_modules/openclaw/skills/blucli/SKILL.md</location>
  </skill>
  <skill>
    <name>clawhub</name>
    <description>Use the ClawHub CLI to search, install, update, and publish agent skills from clawhub.com. Use when you need to fetch new skills on the fly, sync installed skills to latest or a specific version, or publish new/updated skill folders with the npm-installed clawhub CLI.</description>
    <location>/usr/local/lib/node_modules/openclaw/skills/clawhub/SKILL.md</location>
  </skill>
  <skill>
    <name>eightctl</name>
    <description>Control Eight Sleep pods (status, temperature, alarms, schedules).</description>
    <location>/usr/local/lib/node_modules/openclaw/skills/eightctl/SKILL.md</location>

  <skill>

    <location>/usr/local/lib/node_modules/openclaw/skills/gemini/SKILL.md</location>

  <skill>

    <location>/usr/local/lib/node_modules/openclaw/skills/gifgrep/SKILL.md</location>

    <name>github</name>

    <location>/usr/local/lib/node_modules/openclaw/skills/github/SKILL.md</location>
  </skill>
  <skill>
    <name>gog</name>
    <description>Google Workspace CLI for Gmail, Calendar, Drive, Contacts, Sheets, and Docs.</description>
    <location>/usr/local/lib/node_modules/openclaw/skills/gog/SKILL.md</location>

    <location>/usr/local/lib/node_modules/openclaw/skills/healthcheck/SKILL.md</location>

skillsSnapshot.prompt:
The following skills provide specialized instructions for specific tasks.
Use the read tool to load a skill's file when the task matches its description.
When a skill file references a relative path, resolve it against the skill directory (parent of SKILL.md / dirname of the path) and use that absolute path in tool commands.

resolvedSkills.description: Get current weather and forecasts (no API key required).

resolvedSkills.name: stock-analysis
resolvedSkills.description: Analyze stocks and cryptocurrencies using Yahoo Finance data. Supports portfolio management, watchlists with alerts, dividend analysis, 8-dimension stock scoring, viral trend detection (Hot Scanner), and rumor/early signal detection. Use for stock analysis, portfolio tracking, earnings reactions, crypto monitoring, trending stocks, or finding rumors before they hit mainstream.

resolvedSkills.name: stock-market-pro
resolvedSkills.description: Yahoo Finance (yfinance) powered stock analysis skill: quotes, fundamentals, ASCII trends, high-resolution charts (RSI/MACD/BB/VWAP/ATR), plus optional web add-ons (news + browser-first options/flow).

resolvedSkills.name: stock-watcher
resolvedSkills.description: Manage and monitor a personal stock watchlist with support for adding, removing, listing stocks, and summarizing their recent performance using data from 10jqka.com.cn. Use when the user wants to track specific stocks, get performance summaries, or manage their watchlist.

skillsSnapshot.prompt:
The following skills provide specialized instructions for specific tasks.
Use the read tool to load a skill's file when the task matches its description.
When a skill file references a relative path, resolve it against the skill directory (parent of SKILL.md / dirname of the path) and use that absolute path in tool commands.

resolvedSkills.description: Discord ops via the message tool (channel=discord).

resolvedSkills.name: eightctl
resolvedSkills.description: Control Eight Sleep pods (status, temperature, alarms, schedules).

resolvedSkills.name: gemini
resolvedSkills.description: Gemini CLI for one-shot Q&A, summaries, and generation.

resolvedSkills.name: gifgrep
resolvedSkills.description: Search GIF providers with CLI/TUI, download results, and extract stills/sheets.

resolvedSkills.name: github
resolvedSkills.description: Interact with GitHub using the `gh` CLI. Use `gh issue`, `gh pr`, `gh run`, and `gh api` for issues, PRs, CI runs, and advanced queries.

resolvedSkills.name: gog
resolvedSkills.description: Google Workspace CLI for Gmail, Calendar, Drive, Contacts, Sheets, and Docs.

resolvedSkills.name: healthcheck
resolvedSkills.description: Host security hardening and risk-tolerance configuration for OpenClaw deployments. Use when a user asks for security audits, firewall/SSH/update hardening, risk posture, exposure review, OpenClaw cron scheduling for periodic checks, or version status checks on a machine running OpenClaw (laptop, workstation, Pi, VPS).

resolvedSkills.name: himalaya
resolvedSkills.description: CLI to manage emails via IMAP/SMTP. Use `himalaya` to list, read, write, reply, forward, search, and organize emails from the terminal. Supports multiple accounts and message composition with MML (MIME Meta Language).

resolvedSkills.name: imsg
resolvedSkills.description: iMessage/SMS CLI for listing chats, history, watch, and sending.

resolvedSkills.name: mcporter
resolvedSkills.description: Use the mcporter CLI to list, configure, auth, and call MCP servers/tools directly (HTTP or stdio), including ad-hoc servers, config edits, and CLI/type generation.

resolvedSkills.name: nano-pdf
resolvedSkills.description: Edit PDFs with natural-language instructions using the nano-pdf CLI.

resolvedSkills.name: obsidian
resolvedSkills.description: Work with Obsidian vaults (plain Markdown notes) and automate via obsidian-cli.

resolvedSkills.name: openai-image-gen
resolvedSkills.description: Batch-generate images via OpenAI Images API. Random prompt sampler + `index.html` gallery.

resolvedSkills.name: openai-whisper
resolvedSkills.description: Local speech-to-text with the Whisper CLI (no API key).

resolvedSkills.name: openai-whisper-api
resolvedSkills.description: Transcribe audio via OpenAI Audio Transcriptions API (Whisper).

resolvedSkills.name: openhue
resolvedSkills.description: Control Philips Hue lights/scenes via the OpenHue CLI.

resolvedSkills.name: oracle
resolvedSkills.description: Best practices for using the oracle CLI (prompt + file bundling, engines, sessions, and file attachment patterns).

resolvedSkills.name: ordercli
resolvedSkills.description: Foodora-only CLI for checking past orders and active order status (Deliveroo WIP).

resolvedSkills.name: peekaboo
resolvedSkills.description: Capture and automate macOS UI with the Peekaboo CLI.

resolvedSkills.name: skill-creator
resolvedSkills.description: Create or update AgentSkills. Use when designing, structuring, or packaging skills with scripts, references, and assets.

resolvedSkills.name: songsee
resolvedSkills.description: Generate spectrograms and feature-panel visualizations from audio with the songsee CLI.

resolvedSkills.name: sonoscli
resolvedSkills.description: Control Sonos speakers (discover/status/play/volume/group).

resolvedSkills.name: things-mac
resolvedSkills.description: Manage Things 3 via the `things` CLI on macOS (add/update projects+todos via URL scheme; read/search/list from the local Things database). Use when a user asks OpenClaw to add a task to Things, list inbox/today/upcoming, search tasks, or inspect projects/areas/tags.

resolvedSkills.name: video-frames
resolvedSkills.description: Extract frames or short clips from videos using ffmpeg.

resolvedSkills.name: wacli
resolvedSkills.description: Send WhatsApp messages to other people or search/sync WhatsApp history via the wacli CLI (not for normal user chats).

resolvedSkills.name: weather
resolvedSkills.description: Get current weather and forecasts (no API key required).

resolvedSkills.name: stock-analysis
resolvedSkills.description: Analyze stocks and cryptocurrencies using Yahoo Finance data. Supports portfolio management, watchlists with alerts, dividend analysis, 8-dimension stock scoring, viral trend detection (Hot Scanner), and rumor/early signal detection. Use for stock analysis, portfolio tracking, earnings reactions, crypto monitoring, trending stocks, or finding rumors before they hit mainstream.

resolvedSkills.name: stock-market-pro
resolvedSkills.description: Yahoo Finance (yfinance) powered stock analysis skill: quotes, fundamentals, ASCII trends, high-resolution charts (RSI/MACD/BB/VWAP/ATR), plus optional web add-ons (news + browser-first options/flow).

resolvedSkills.name: stock-watcher
resolvedSkills.description: Manage and monitor a personal stock watchlist with support for adding, removing, listing stocks, and summarizing their recent performance using data from 10jqka.com.cn. Use when the user wants to track specific stocks, get performance summaries, or manage their watchlist.

skillsSnapshot.prompt:
The following skills provide specialized instructions for specific tasks.
Use the read tool to load a skill's file when the task matches its description.
When a skill file references a relative path, resolve it against the skill directory (parent of SKILL.md / dirname of the path) and use that absolute path in tool commands.

skillsSnapshot.prompt:
The following skills provide specialized instructions for specific tasks.
Use the read tool to load a skill's file when the task matches its description.
When a skill file references a relative path, resolve it against the skill directory (parent of SKILL.md / dirname of the path) and use that absolute path in tool commands.

resolvedSkills.description: Use the ClawHub CLI to search, install, update, and publish agent skills from clawhub.com. Use when you need to fetch new skills on the fly, sync installed skills to latest or a specific version, or publish new/updated skill folders with the npm-installed clawhub CLI.

resolvedSkills.name: discord
resolvedSkills.description: Discord ops via the message tool (channel=discord).

resolvedSkills.name: eightctl
resolvedSkills.description: Control Eight Sleep pods (status, temperature, alarms, schedules).

resolvedSkills.name: gemini
resolvedSkills.description: Gemini CLI for one-shot Q&A, summaries, and generation.

resolvedSkills.name: gifgrep
resolvedSkills.description: Search GIF providers with CLI/TUI, download results, and extract stills/sheets.

resolvedSkills.name: github
resolvedSkills.description: Interact with GitHub using the `gh` CLI. Use `gh issue`, `gh pr`, `gh run`, and `gh api` for issues, PRs, CI runs, and advanced queries.

resolvedSkills.name: gog
resolvedSkills.description: Google Workspace CLI for Gmail, Calendar, Drive, Contacts, Sheets, and Docs.

resolvedSkills.name: healthcheck
resolvedSkills.description: Host security hardening and risk-tolerance configuration for OpenClaw deployments. Use when a user asks for security audits, firewall/SSH/update hardening, risk posture, exposure review, OpenClaw cron scheduling for periodic checks, or version status checks on a machine running OpenClaw (laptop, workstation, Pi, VPS).

resolvedSkills.name: himalaya
resolvedSkills.description: CLI to manage emails via IMAP/SMTP. Use `himalaya` to list, read, write, reply, forward, search, and organize emails from the terminal. Supports multiple accounts and message composition with MML (MIME Meta Language).

resolvedSkills.name: imsg
resolvedSkills.description: iMessage/SMS CLI for listing chats, history, watch, and sending.

resolvedSkills.name: mcporter
resolvedSkills.description: Use the mcporter CLI to list, configure, auth, and call MCP servers/tools directly (HTTP or stdio), including ad-hoc servers, config edits, and CLI/type generation.

resolvedSkills.name: nano-pdf
resolvedSkills.description: Edit PDFs with natural-language instructions using the nano-pdf CLI.

resolvedSkills.name: obsidian
resolvedSkills.description: Work with Obsidian vaults (plain Markdown notes) and automate via obsidian-cli.

resolvedSkills.name: openai-image-gen
resolvedSkills.description: Batch-generate images via OpenAI Images API. Random prompt sampler + `index.html` gallery.

resolvedSkills.name: openai-whisper
resolvedSkills.description: Local speech-to-text with the Whisper CLI (no API key).

resolvedSkills.name: openai-whisper-api
resolvedSkills.description: Transcribe audio via OpenAI Audio Transcriptions API (Whisper).

resolvedSkills.name: openhue
resolvedSkills.description: Control Philips Hue lights/scenes via the OpenHue CLI.

resolvedSkills.name: oracle
resolvedSkills.description: Best practices for using the oracle CLI (prompt + file bundling, engines, sessions, and file attachment patterns).

resolvedSkills.name: ordercli
resolvedSkills.description: Foodora-only CLI for checking past orders and active order status (Deliveroo WIP).

resolvedSkills.name: peekaboo
resolvedSkills.description: Capture and automate macOS UI with the Peekaboo CLI.

resolvedSkills.name: skill-creator
resolvedSkills.description: Create or update AgentSkills. Use when designing, structuring, or packaging skills with scripts, references, and assets.

resolvedSkills.name: songsee
resolvedSkills.description: Generate spectrograms and feature-panel visualizations from audio with the songsee CLI.

resolvedSkills.name: sonoscli
resolvedSkills.description: Control Sonos speakers (discover/status/play/volume/group).

resolvedSkills.name: things-mac
resolvedSkills.description: Manage Things 3 via the `things` CLI on macOS (add/update projects+todos via URL scheme; read/search/list from the local Things database). Use when a user asks OpenClaw to add a task to Things, list inbox/today/upcoming, search tasks, or inspect projects/areas/tags.

resolvedSkills.name: video-frames
resolvedSkills.description: Extract frames or short clips from videos using ffmpeg.

resolvedSkills.name: wacli
resolvedSkills.description: Send WhatsApp messages to other people or search/sync WhatsApp history via the wacli CLI (not for normal user chats).

resolvedSkills.name: weather
resolvedSkills.description: Get current weather and forecasts (no API key required).

resolvedSkills.name: stock-analysis
resolvedSkills.description: Analyze stocks and cryptocurrencies using Yahoo Finance data. Supports portfolio management, watchlists with alerts, dividend analysis, 8-dimension stock scoring, viral trend detection (Hot Scanner), and rumor/early signal detection. Use for stock analysis, portfolio tracking, earnings reactions, crypto monitoring, trending stocks, or finding rumors before they hit mainstream.

resolvedSkills.name: stock-market-pro
resolvedSkills.description: Yahoo Finance (yfinance) powered stock analysis skill: quotes, fundamentals, ASCII trends, high-resolution charts (RSI/MACD/BB/VWAP/ATR), plus optional web add-ons (news + browser-first options/flow).

resolvedSkills.name: stock-watcher
resolvedSkills.description: Manage and monitor a personal stock watchlist with support for adding, removing, listing stocks, and summarizing their recent performance using data from 10jqka.com.cn. Use when the user wants to track specific stocks, get performance summaries, or manage their watchlist.

skillsSnapshot.prompt:
The following skills provide specialized instructions for specific tasks.
Use the read tool to load a skill's file when the task matches its description.
When a skill file references a relative path, resolve it against the skill directory (parent of SKILL.md / dirname of the path) and use that absolute path in tool commands.

skillsSnapshot.prompt:
The following skills provide specialized instructions for specific tasks.
Use the read tool to load a skill's file when the task matches its description.
When a skill file references a relative path, resolve it against the skill directory (parent of SKILL.md / dirname of the path) and use that absolute path in tool commands.

resolvedSkills.name: blucli
resolvedSkills.description: BluOS CLI (blu) for discovery, playback, grouping, and volume.

resolvedSkills.name: clawhub
resolvedSkills.description: Use the ClawHub CLI to search, install, update, and publish agent skills from clawhub.com. Use when you need to fetch new skills on the fly, sync installed skills to latest or a specific version, or publish new/updated skill folders with the npm-installed clawhub CLI.

resolvedSkills.name: discord
resolvedSkills.description: Discord ops via the message tool (channel=discord).

resolvedSkills.name: eightctl
resolvedSkills.description: Control Eight Sleep pods (status, temperature, alarms, schedules).

resolvedSkills.name: gemini
resolvedSkills.description: Gemini CLI for one-shot Q&A, summaries, and generation.

resolvedSkills.name: gifgrep
resolvedSkills.description: Search GIF providers with CLI/TUI, download results, and extract stills/sheets.

resolvedSkills.name: github
resolvedSkills.description: Interact with GitHub using the `gh` CLI. Use `gh issue`, `gh pr`, `gh run`, and `gh api` for issues, PRs, CI runs, and advanced queries.

resolvedSkills.name: gog
resolvedSkills.description: Google Workspace CLI for Gmail, Calendar, Drive, Contacts, Sheets, and Docs.

resolvedSkills.name: healthcheck
resolvedSkills.description: Host security hardening and risk-tolerance configuration for OpenClaw deployments. Use when a user asks for security audits, firewall/SSH/update hardening, risk posture, exposure review, OpenClaw cron scheduling for periodic checks, or version status checks on a machine running OpenClaw (laptop, workstation, Pi, VPS).

resolvedSkills.name: himalaya
resolvedSkills.description: CLI to manage emails via IMAP/SMTP. Use `himalaya` to list, read, write, reply, forward, search, and organize emails from the terminal. Supports multiple accounts and message composition with MML (MIME Meta Language).

resolvedSkills.name: imsg
resolvedSkills.description: iMessage/SMS CLI for listing chats, history, watch, and sending.

resolvedSkills.name: mcporter
resolvedSkills.description: Use the mcporter CLI to list, configure, auth, and call MCP servers/tools directly (HTTP or stdio), including ad-hoc servers, config edits, and CLI/type generation.

resolvedSkills.name: nano-pdf
resolvedSkills.description: Edit PDFs with natural-language instructions using the nano-pdf CLI.

resolvedSkills.name: obsidian
resolvedSkills.description: Work with Obsidian vaults (plain Markdown notes) and automate via obsidian-cli.

resolvedSkills.name: openai-image-gen
resolvedSkills.description: Batch-generate images via OpenAI Images API. Random prompt sampler + `index.html` gallery.

resolvedSkills.name: openai-whisper
resolvedSkills.description: Local speech-to-text with the Whisper CLI (no API key).

resolvedSkills.name: openai-whisper-api
resolvedSkills.description: Transcribe audio via OpenAI Audio Transcriptions API (Whisper).

resolvedSkills.name: openhue
resolvedSkills.description: Control Philips Hue lights/scenes via the OpenHue CLI.

resolvedSkills.name: oracle
resolvedSkills.description: Best practices for using the oracle CLI (prompt + file bundling, engines, sessions, and file attachment patterns).

resolvedSkills.name: ordercli
resolvedSkills.description: Foodora-only CLI for checking past orders and active order status (Deliveroo WIP).

resolvedSkills.name: peekaboo
resolvedSkills.description: Capture and automate macOS UI with the Peekaboo CLI.

resolvedSkills.name: skill-creator
resolvedSkills.description: Create or update AgentSkills. Use when designing, structuring, or packaging skills with scripts, references, and assets.

resolvedSkills.name: songsee
resolvedSkills.description: Generate spectrograms and feature-panel visualizations from audio with the songsee CLI.

resolvedSkills.name: sonoscli
resolvedSkills.description: Control Sonos speakers (discover/status/play/volume/group).

resolvedSkills.name: things-mac
resolvedSkills.description: Manage Things 3 via the `things` CLI on macOS (add/update projects+todos via URL scheme; read/search/list from the local Things database). Use when a user asks OpenClaw to add a task to Things, list inbox/today/upcoming, search tasks, or inspect projects/areas/tags.

resolvedSkills.name: video-frames
resolvedSkills.description: Extract frames or short clips from videos using ffmpeg.

resolvedSkills.name: wacli
resolvedSkills.description: Send WhatsApp messages to other people or search/sync WhatsApp history via the wacli CLI (not for normal user chats).

resolvedSkills.name: weather
resolvedSkills.description: Get current weather and forecasts (no API key required).

resolvedSkills.name: stock-analysis
resolvedSkills.description: Analyze stocks and cryptocurrencies using Yahoo Finance data. Supports portfolio management, watchlists with alerts, dividend analysis, 8-dimension stock scoring, viral trend detection (Hot Scanner), and rumor/early signal detection. Use for stock analysis, portfolio tracking, earnings reactions, crypto monitoring, trending stocks, or finding rumors before they hit mainstream.

resolvedSkills.name: stock-market-pro
resolvedSkills.description: Yahoo Finance (yfinance) powered stock analysis skill: quotes, fundamentals, ASCII trends, high-resolution charts (RSI/MACD/BB/VWAP/ATR), plus optional web add-ons (news + browser-first options/flow).

resolvedSkills.name: stock-watcher
resolvedSkills.description: Manage and monitor a personal stock watchlist with support for adding, removing, listing stocks, and summarizing their recent performance using data from 10jqka.com.cn. Use when the user wants to track specific stocks, get performance summaries, or manage their watchlist.

skillsSnapshot.prompt:
The following skills provide specialized instructions for specific tasks.
Use the read tool to load a skill's file when the task matches its description.
When a skill file references a relative path, resolve it against the skill directory (parent of SKILL.md / dirname of the path) and use that absolute path in tool commands.

skillsSnapshot.prompt:
The following skills provide specialized instructions for specific tasks.
Use the read tool to load a skill's file when the task matches its description.
When a skill file references a relative path, resolve it against the skill directory (parent of SKILL.md / dirname of the path) and use that absolute path in tool commands.

resolvedSkills.name: blogwatcher
resolvedSkills.description: Monitor blogs and RSS/Atom feeds for updates using the blogwatcher CLI.

resolvedSkills.name: blucli
resolvedSkills.description: BluOS CLI (blu) for discovery, playback, grouping, and volume.

resolvedSkills.name: clawhub
resolvedSkills.description: Use the ClawHub CLI to search, install, update, and publish agent skills from clawhub.com. Use when you need to fetch new skills on the fly, sync installed skills to latest or a specific version, or publish new/updated skill folders with the npm-installed clawhub CLI.

resolvedSkills.name: discord
resolvedSkills.description: Discord ops via the message tool (channel=discord).

resolvedSkills.name: eightctl
resolvedSkills.description: Control Eight Sleep pods (status, temperature, alarms, schedules).

resolvedSkills.name: gemini
resolvedSkills.description: Gemini CLI for one-shot Q&A, summaries, and generation.

resolvedSkills.name: gifgrep
resolvedSkills.description: Search GIF providers with CLI/TUI, download results, and extract stills/sheets.

resolvedSkills.name: github
resolvedSkills.description: Interact with GitHub using the `gh` CLI. Use `gh issue`, `gh pr`, `gh run`, and `gh api` for issues, PRs, CI runs, and advanced queries.

resolvedSkills.name: gog
resolvedSkills.description: Google Workspace CLI for Gmail, Calendar, Drive, Contacts, Sheets, and Docs.

resolvedSkills.name: healthcheck
resolvedSkills.description: Host security hardening and risk-tolerance configuration for OpenClaw deployments. Use when a user asks for security audits, firewall/SSH/update hardening, risk posture, exposure review, OpenClaw cron scheduling for periodic checks, or version status checks on a machine running OpenClaw (laptop, workstation, Pi, VPS).

resolvedSkills.name: himalaya
resolvedSkills.description: CLI to manage emails via IMAP/SMTP. Use `himalaya` to list, read, write, reply, forward, search, and organize emails from the terminal. Supports multiple accounts and message composition with MML (MIME Meta Language).

resolvedSkills.name: imsg
resolvedSkills.description: iMessage/SMS CLI for listing chats, history, watch, and sending.

resolvedSkills.name: mcporter
resolvedSkills.description: Use the mcporter CLI to list, configure, auth, and call MCP servers/tools directly (HTTP or stdio), including ad-hoc servers, config edits, and CLI/type generation.

resolvedSkills.name: nano-pdf
resolvedSkills.description: Edit PDFs with natural-language instructions using the nano-pdf CLI.

resolvedSkills.name: obsidian
resolvedSkills.description: Work with Obsidian vaults (plain Markdown notes) and automate via obsidian-cli.

resolvedSkills.name: openai-image-gen
resolvedSkills.description: Batch-generate images via OpenAI Images API. Random prompt sampler + `index.html` gallery.

resolvedSkills.name: openai-whisper
resolvedSkills.description: Local speech-to-text with the Whisper CLI (no API key).

resolvedSkills.name: openai-whisper-api
resolvedSkills.description: Transcribe audio via OpenAI Audio Transcriptions API (Whisper).

resolvedSkills.name: openhue
resolvedSkills.description: Control Philips Hue lights/scenes via the OpenHue CLI.

resolvedSkills.name: oracle
resolvedSkills.description: Best practices for using the oracle CLI (prompt + file bundling, engines, sessions, and file attachment patterns).

resolvedSkills.name: ordercli
resolvedSkills.description: Foodora-only CLI for checking past orders and active order status (Deliveroo WIP).

resolvedSkills.name: peekaboo
resolvedSkills.description: Capture and automate macOS UI with the Peekaboo CLI.

resolvedSkills.name: skill-creator
resolvedSkills.description: Create or update AgentSkills. Use when designing, structuring, or packaging skills with scripts, references, and assets.

resolvedSkills.name: songsee
resolvedSkills.description: Generate spectrograms and feature-panel visualizations from audio with the songsee CLI.

resolvedSkills.name: sonoscli
resolvedSkills.description: Control Sonos speakers (discover/status/play/volume/group).

resolvedSkills.name: things-mac
resolvedSkills.description: Manage Things 3 via the `things` CLI on macOS (add/update projects+todos via URL scheme; read/search/list from the local Things database). Use when a user asks OpenClaw to add a task to Things, list inbox/today/upcoming, search tasks, or inspect projects/areas/tags.

resolvedSkills.name: video-frames
resolvedSkills.description: Extract frames or short clips from videos using ffmpeg.

resolvedSkills.name: wacli
resolvedSkills.description: Send WhatsApp messages to other people or search/sync WhatsApp history via the wacli CLI (not for normal user chats).

resolvedSkills.name: weather
resolvedSkills.description: Get current weather and forecasts (no API key required).

resolvedSkills.name: stock-analysis
resolvedSkills.description: Analyze stocks and cryptocurrencies using Yahoo Finance data. Supports portfolio management, watchlists with alerts, dividend analysis, 8-dimension stock scoring, viral trend detection (Hot Scanner), and rumor/early signal detection. Use for stock analysis, portfolio tracking, earnings reactions, crypto monitoring, trending stocks, or finding rumors before they hit mainstream.

resolvedSkills.name: stock-market-pro
resolvedSkills.description: Yahoo Finance (yfinance) powered stock analysis skill: quotes, fundamentals, ASCII trends, high-resolution charts (RSI/MACD/BB/VWAP/ATR), plus optional web add-ons (news + browser-first options/flow).

resolvedSkills.name: stock-watcher
resolvedSkills.description: Manage and monitor a personal stock watchlist with support for adding, removing, listing stocks, and summarizing their recent performance using data from 10jqka.com.cn. Use when the user wants to track specific stocks, get performance summaries, or manage their watchlist.

skillsSnapshot.prompt:
The following skills provide specialized instructions for specific tasks.
Use the read tool to load a skill's file when the task matches its description.
When a skill file references a relative path, resolve it against the skill directory (parent of SKILL.md / dirname of the path) and use that absolute path in tool commands.

skillsSnapshot.prompt:
The following skills provide specialized instructions for specific tasks.
Use the read tool to load a skill's file when the task matches its description.
When a skill file references a relative path, resolve it against the skill directory (parent of SKILL.md / dirname of the path) and use that absolute path in tool commands.

resolvedSkills.name: blogwatcher
resolvedSkills.description: Monitor blogs and RSS/Atom feeds for updates using the blogwatcher CLI.

resolvedSkills.name: blucli
resolvedSkills.description: BluOS CLI (blu) for discovery, playback, grouping, and volume.

resolvedSkills.name: clawhub
resolvedSkills.description: Use the ClawHub CLI to search, install, update, and publish agent skills from clawhub.com. Use when you need to fetch new skills on the fly, sync installed skills to latest or a specific version, or publish new/updated skill folders with the npm-installed clawhub CLI.

resolvedSkills.name: discord
resolvedSkills.description: Discord ops via the message tool (channel=discord).

resolvedSkills.name: eightctl
resolvedSkills.description: Control Eight Sleep pods (status, temperature, alarms, schedules).

resolvedSkills.name: gemini
resolvedSkills.description: Gemini CLI for one-shot Q&A, summaries, and generation.

resolvedSkills.name: gifgrep
resolvedSkills.description: Search GIF providers with CLI/TUI, download results, and extract stills/sheets.

resolvedSkills.name: github
resolvedSkills.description: Interact with GitHub using the `gh` CLI. Use `gh issue`, `gh pr`, `gh run`, and `gh api` for issues, PRs, CI runs, and advanced queries.

resolvedSkills.name: gog
resolvedSkills.description: Google Workspace CLI for Gmail, Calendar, Drive, Contacts, Sheets, and Docs.

resolvedSkills.name: healthcheck
resolvedSkills.description: Host security hardening and risk-tolerance configuration for OpenClaw deployments. Use when a user asks for security audits, firewall/SSH/update hardening, risk posture, exposure review, OpenClaw cron scheduling for periodic checks, or version status checks on a machine running OpenClaw (laptop, workstation, Pi, VPS).

resolvedSkills.name: himalaya
resolvedSkills.description: CLI to manage emails via IMAP/SMTP. Use `himalaya` to list, read, write, reply, forward, search, and organize emails from the terminal. Supports multiple accounts and message composition with MML (MIME Meta Language).

resolvedSkills.name: imsg
resolvedSkills.description: iMessage/SMS CLI for listing chats, history, watch, and sending.

resolvedSkills.name: mcporter
resolvedSkills.description: Use the mcporter CLI to list, configure, auth, and call MCP servers/tools directly (HTTP or stdio), including ad-hoc servers, config edits, and CLI/type generation.

resolvedSkills.name: nano-pdf
resolvedSkills.description: Edit PDFs with natural-language instructions using the nano-pdf CLI.

resolvedSkills.name: obsidian
resolvedSkills.description: Work with Obsidian vaults (plain Markdown notes) and automate via obsidian-cli.

resolvedSkills.name: openai-image-gen
resolvedSkills.description: Batch-generate images via OpenAI Images API. Random prompt sampler + `index.html` gallery.

resolvedSkills.name: openai-whisper
resolvedSkills.description: Local speech-to-text with the Whisper CLI (no API key).

resolvedSkills.name: openai-whisper-api
resolvedSkills.description: Transcribe audio via OpenAI Audio Transcriptions API (Whisper).

resolvedSkills.name: openhue
resolvedSkills.description: Control Philips Hue lights/scenes via the OpenHue CLI.

resolvedSkills.name: oracle
resolvedSkills.description: Best practices for using the oracle CLI (prompt + file bundling, engines, sessions, and file attachment patterns).

resolvedSkills.name: ordercli
resolvedSkills.description: Foodora-only CLI for checking past orders and active order status (Deliveroo WIP).

resolvedSkills.name: peekaboo
resolvedSkills.description: Capture and automate macOS UI with the Peekaboo CLI.

resolvedSkills.name: skill-creator
resolvedSkills.description: Create or update AgentSkills. Use when designing, structuring, or packaging skills with scripts, references, and assets.

resolvedSkills.name: songsee
resolvedSkills.description: Generate spectrograms and feature-panel visualizations from audio with the songsee CLI.

resolvedSkills.name: sonoscli
resolvedSkills.description: Control Sonos speakers (discover/status/play/volume/group).

resolvedSkills.name: things-mac
resolvedSkills.description: Manage Things 3 via the `things` CLI on macOS (add/update projects+todos via URL scheme; read/search/list from the local Things database). Use when a user asks OpenClaw to add a task to Things, list inbox/today/upcoming, search tasks, or inspect projects/areas/tags.

resolvedSkills.name: video-frames
resolvedSkills.description: Extract frames or short clips from videos using ffmpeg.

resolvedSkills.name: wacli
resolvedSkills.description: Send WhatsApp messages to other people or search/sync WhatsApp history via the wacli CLI (not for normal user chats).

resolvedSkills.name: weather
resolvedSkills.description: Get current weather and forecasts (no API key required).

resolvedSkills.name: stock-analysis
resolvedSkills.description: Analyze stocks and cryptocurrencies using Yahoo Finance data. Supports portfolio management, watchlists with alerts, dividend analysis, 8-dimension stock scoring, viral trend detection (Hot Scanner), and rumor/early signal detection. Use for stock analysis, portfolio tracking, earnings reactions, crypto monitoring, trending stocks, or finding rumors before they hit mainstream.

resolvedSkills.name: stock-market-pro
resolvedSkills.description: Yahoo Finance (yfinance) powered stock analysis skill: quotes, fundamentals, ASCII trends, high-resolution charts (RSI/MACD/BB/VWAP/ATR), plus optional web add-ons (news + browser-first options/flow).

resolvedSkills.name: stock-watcher
resolvedSkills.description: Manage and monitor a personal stock watchlist with support for adding, removing, listing stocks, and summarizing their recent performance using data from 10jqka.com.cn. Use when the user wants to track specific stocks, get performance summaries, or manage their watchlist.

skillsSnapshot.prompt:
The following skills provide specialized instructions for specific tasks.
Use the read tool to load a skill's file when the task matches its description.
When a skill file references a relative path, resolve it against the skill directory (parent of SKILL.md / dirname of the path) and use that absolute path in tool commands.
